DOC.brief_title: Wound Vac Bandage Comparison After Spinal Fusion
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomized control study : Patients undergo posterior spinal fusion randomize standard postoperative dress versus incisional VAC dressing . Both group hematocrit , total lymphocyte count , albumin check preoperatively assess nutritional status , drawn time standard preoperative labs history physical visit . Both group undergo standard wound closure dress application break sterile field . The incisional VAC group undergo placement Adaptic dressing incision . A standard VAC sponge place secure adhesive dressing , suction tube connect VAC machine set 75 mmHg continuous suction . The incisional VAC leave place 72 hour postoperatively . Remainder postoperative care follow standard posterior spinal fusion protocol identical group . Patients follow minimum 2 year postoperatively .
